price: 53. Marka loo akhriyona (Qur'aanka), waxay yidhaahdaan: Waanu rumaysannahay. hubaal, waa Xaq ka yimid Rabbigayo. Waxaanu ahayn isaga ka horba Muslimiin.
arabic: وَإِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā yut'lā ʿalayhim qālū āmannā bihi innahu al-ḥaqu min rabbinā innā kunnā min qablihi mus'limīna
